long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Extension will calculate the woking hours for you. monthly and quartely.
All you need to do is to login to your hours system and then you will see new line at the top of the screen with a summery.

Disclaimer:
The extention use your login's token number for the HTTP request.
NO data is save anywhere!
